original_text: “And there before me was a second beast, which looked like a bear. It was raised up on one of its sides, and it had three ribs in its mouth between its teeth. It was told, ‘Get up and eat your fill of flesh!’
korean_text: 다른 짐승 곧 둘째는 곰과 같은데 그것이 몸 한쪽을 들었고 그 입의 잇사이에는 세 갈빗대가 물렸는데 그것에게 말하는 자들이 있어 이르기를 일어나서 많은 고기를 먹으라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And there before me was a second beast
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에 두 번째 짐승이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: It was raised up on one of its sides
and it had three ribs in its mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 입에는 세 개의 갈비뼈가 있었다

sentences.original_text: 'Get up and eat your fill of flesh!'
